message.subject: Travel and Seminars
message.content:
M1.1. Mark -
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. for your approval
[Inform: Elizabeth (James?) is presenting the following for Mark to approve]
M1.3. 1. Trip for me to San Diego to attend WSPP meeting.
[Inform: Elizabeth/James would like to go to San Diego to attend WSPP meeting]
Sflink1.3
M1.4. 2 Trip for Shari to Portland in November while Christian is on Thanksgiving
holiday.
[Inform: Shari would like to go to Portland while Christian has a Thanksgiving holiday]
Sflink1.4
M1.5. Thanks
[Conventional: thanks]
M1.6. ps - I will schedule a meeting with you this week to discuss Shari/staffing
in Portland office.
[Inform: Elizabeth/James will schedule a meeting to discuss Shari and Portland office staffing]

message.subject: Travel and Seminars
message.content:
M2.1. ok
[Inform: Mark gives his approval]
Blink1.3
Blink1.4
